spells.name: Gentle Breeze
spells.description: Light wind protects one target from clouds, gases, heat, and vapors.

spells.name: Heightened Awareness
spells.description: Your recall and ability to process information improve.

spells.name: Monkey Fish
spells.description: Gain a climb speed and a swim speed of 10 ft. for a time.

spells.name: Nauseating Dart
spells.description: Poisonous stinger deals 1d2 damage and sickens target.

spells.name: Thorn Javelin
spells.description: Wield a javelin that sickens opponents when it strikes.

spells.name: Wave Shield
spells.description: Water blunts one incoming attack or fire effect.
